values.description: A Long Straddle consists of buying an ATM call and an ATM put, where both contracts have the same underlying asset, strike price, and expiration date.
values.keywords: profit from volatile movements in the underlying stock, long straddle option strategy, contracts in the strategy legs, Strategy Payoff, maximum profit is unlimited
values.og:description: A Long Straddle consists of buying an ATM call and an ATM put, where both contracts have the same underlying asset, strike price, and expiration date.
